/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, characterized by their curved roofs and ornate decorations. These buildings are painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the scene. Cars are parked along the side of the street, indicating a bustling urban environment. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the colorful buildings. In the background, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image provides a glimpse into the blend of tradition and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
